fr.lri.swingstates.canvas

Class ClassTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lri.swingstates.sm.Tag
      • fr.lri.swingstates.canvas.CTag
        • fr.lri.swingstates.canvas.CIntentionalTag
          • fr.lri.swingstates.canvas.ClassTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CElement, java.util.Iterator

    public class ClassTag
extends CIntentionalTag
    Author:
    Caroline Appert A ClassTag is an intentional tag corresponding to a group of shape tagged by a tag of a given class.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the existing ClassTag registered on a given canvas or creates it if it does not exist.

      • criterion

        public boolean criterion(CShape s)
        The method to override to specify the property a shape must check to be tagged by this tag.
        Specified by:
        criterion in class CIntentionalTag
        Parameters:
        s - The shape.
        Returns:
        true if s checks the property, false otherwise.

      • getTag

        public static ClassTag getTag(Canvas c,
              java.lang.Class tagClass)
        Returns the existing ClassTag registered on a given canvas or creates it if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        c - The canvas on which must be registered this tag
        tagClass - The class of the tag
        Returns:
        The tagClass
